org.apache.poi.ss.util

Class SheetUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ss.util.SheetUtil

  • public class SheetUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods for when working with Usermodel sheets(使用用户模型工作表时的帮助方法)
    Author:
    Yegor Kozlov

      static boolean canComputeColumnWidth(Font font)

      static Cell getCell(Sheet sheet, int rowIx, int colIx)
      Return the cell, without taking account of merged regions.(返回单元格，而不考虑合并的区域。)
      static double getCellWidth(Cell cell, int defaultCharWidth, DataFormatter formatter, boolean useMergedCells)
      Compute width of a single cell(计算单个单元格的宽度)
      static double getCellWidth(Cell cell, int defaultCharWidth, DataFormatter formatter, boolean useMergedCells, java.util.List<CellRangeAddress> mergedRegions)
      Compute width of a single cell This method receives the list of merged regions as querying it from the cell/sheet is time-consuming and thus caching the list across cells speeds up certain operations considerably.(计算单个单元格的宽度该方法接收合并区域的列表，因为从单元格/工作表中查询该列表很耗时，因此跨单元格缓存列表可以大大加快某些操作的速度。)
      static Cell getCellWithMerges(Sheet sheet, int rowIx, int colIx)
      Return the cell, taking account of merged regions.(返回单元格，并考虑合并的区域。)
      static double getColumnWidth(Sheet sheet, int column, boolean useMergedCells)
      Compute width of a column and return the result(计算列的宽度并返回结果)
      static double getColumnWidth(Sheet sheet, int column, boolean useMergedCells, int firstRow, int lastRow)
      Compute width of a column based on a subset of the rows and return the result(根据行的子集计算列的宽度并返回结果)
      static int getDefaultCharWidth(Workbook wb)
      Get default character width using the Workbook's default font(使用工作簿的默认字体获取默认字符宽度)

    • Method Detail

      • getCellWidth

        public static double getCellWidth(Cell cell,
                                  int defaultCharWidth,
                                  DataFormatter formatter,
                                  boolean useMergedCells)
        Compute width of a single cell(计算单个单元格的宽度)
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell whose width is to be calculated(单元格-要计算其宽度的单元格)
        defaultCharWidth - the width of a single character(defaultCharSize-单个字符的宽度)
        formatter - formatter used to prepare the text to be measured(格式化程序-用于准备要测量的文本的格式化程序)
        useMergedCells - whether to use merged cells(useMergedCells -是否使用合并的细胞)
        Returns:
        the width in pixels or -1 if cell is empty(宽度（以像素为单位），如果单元格为空，则为-1)

      • getCellWidth

        public static double getCellWidth(Cell cell,
                                  int defaultCharWidth,
                                  DataFormatter formatter,
                                  boolean useMergedCells,
                                  java.util.List<CellRangeAddress> mergedRegions)
        Compute width of a single cell This method receives the list of merged regions as querying it from the cell/sheet is time-consuming and thus caching the list across cells speeds up certain operations considerably.(计算单个单元格的宽度该方法接收合并区域的列表，因为从单元格/工作表中查询该列表很耗时，因此跨单元格缓存列表可以大大加快某些操作的速度。)
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell whose width is to be calculated(单元格-要计算其宽度的单元格)
        defaultCharWidth - the width of a single character(defaultCharSize-单个字符的宽度)
        formatter - formatter used to prepare the text to be measured(格式化程序-用于准备要测量的文本的格式化程序)
        useMergedCells - whether to use merged cells(useMergedCells -是否使用合并的细胞)
        mergedRegions - The list of merged regions as received via cell.getSheet().getMergedRegions()(mergedRegions -通过cell.getSheet（）.getMergedRegions（）接收的合并区域列表)
        Returns:
        the width in pixels or -1 if cell is empty(宽度（以像素为单位），如果单元格为空，则为-1)

      • getColumnWidth

        public static double getColumnWidth(Sheet sheet,
                                    int column,
                                    boolean useMergedCells)
        Compute width of a column and return the result(计算列的宽度并返回结果)
        Parameters:
        sheet - the sheet to calculate(表-要计算的表)
        column - 0-based index of the column(基于列0的列索引)
        useMergedCells - whether to use merged cells(useMergedCells -是否使用合并的细胞)
        Returns:
        the width in pixels or -1 if all cells are empty(宽度（以像素为单位），如果所有单元格均为空，则为-1)

      • getColumnWidth

        public static double getColumnWidth(Sheet sheet,
                                    int column,
                                    boolean useMergedCells,
                                    int firstRow,
                                    int lastRow)
        Compute width of a column based on a subset of the rows and return the result(根据行的子集计算列的宽度并返回结果)
        Parameters:
        sheet - the sheet to calculate(表-要计算的表)
        column - 0-based index of the column(基于列0的列索引)
        useMergedCells - whether to use merged cells(useMergedCells -是否使用合并的细胞)
        firstRow - 0-based index of the first row to consider (inclusive)(firstRow -要考虑的第一行的基于0的索引（含）)
        lastRow - 0-based index of the last row to consider (inclusive)(lastRow -要考虑的最后一行的基于0的索引（含）)
        Returns:
        the width in pixels or -1 if cell is empty(宽度（以像素为单位），如果单元格为空，则为-1)

      • getDefaultCharWidth

        @Internal
public static int getDefaultCharWidth(Workbook wb)
        Get default character width using the Workbook's default font(使用工作簿的默认字体获取默认字符宽度)
        Parameters:
        wb - the workbook to get the default character width from(收件箱-获取默认字符宽度的工作簿)
        Returns:
        default character width in pixels(默认字符宽度（像素）)

      • canComputeColumnWidth

        public static boolean canComputeColumnWidth(Font font)
        Check if the Fonts are installed correctly so that Java can compute the size of columns. If a Cell uses a Font which is not available on the operating system then Java may fail to return useful Font metrics and thus lead to an auto-computed size of 0. This method allows to check if computing the sizes for a given Font will succeed or not.(检查字体是否正确安装，以便Java可以计算列的大小。如果Cell使用操作系统上不可用的字体，那么Java可能无法返回有用的字体指标，从而导致自动计算的大小为0。该方法允许检查计算给定字体的大小是否成功。)
        Parameters:
        font - The Font that is used in the Cell(字体-单元格中使用的字体)
        Returns:
        true if computing the size for this Font will succeed, false otherwise(如果计算此字体的大小将成功，则为真，否则为假)

      • getCell

        public static Cell getCell(Sheet sheet,
                           int rowIx,
                           int colIx)
        Return the cell, without taking account of merged regions.

        Use getCellWithMerges(Sheet, int, int) if you want the top left cell from merged regions instead when the reference is a merged cell.

        Use this where you want to know if the given cell is explicitly defined or not.

        (返回单元格，而不考虑合并的区域。如果您希望在引用是合并单元格时使用合并区域中的左上角单元格，请使用getCellWithMerges（Sheet，int，int）。当您想知道给定单元格是否显式定义时，请使用此选项。)
        Parameters:
        sheet - The workbook sheet to look at.(工作表-要查看的工作簿工作表。)
        rowIx - The 0-based index of the row.(rowIx -行的从0开始的索引。)
        colIx - The 0-based index of the cell.(colIx -单元格的从0开始的索引。)
        Returns:
        cell at the given location, or null if not defined(给定位置的单元格，如果未定义，则为空)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if sheet is null(Java.lang. NullPointerResponse-如果工作表为空)

      • getCellWithMerges

        public static Cell getCellWithMerges(Sheet sheet,
                                     int rowIx,
                                     int colIx)
        Return the cell, taking account of merged regions. Allows you to find the cell who's contents are shown in a given position in the sheet.

        If the cell at the given co-ordinates is a merged cell, this will return the primary (top-left) most cell of the merged region.

        If the cell at the given co-ordinates is not in a merged region, then will return the cell itself.

        If there is no cell defined at the given co-ordinates, will return null.

        (返回单元格，并考虑合并的区域。允许您查找内容显示在工作表中给定位置的单元格。如果给定坐标处的单元格是合并的单元格，则将返回合并区域的主（左上）最单元格。如果给定坐标处的单元格不在合并区域中，则将返回单元格本身。如果在给定坐标处没有定义单元格，则返回空。)
        Parameters:
        sheet - The workbook sheet to look at.(工作表-要查看的工作簿工作表。)
        rowIx - The 0-based index of the row.(rowIx -行的从0开始的索引。)
        colIx - The 0-based index of the cell.(colIx -单元格的从0开始的索引。)
        Returns:
        cell at the given location, its base merged cell, or null if not defined(给定位置的单元格、其基本合并单元格，如果未定义，则为空)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if sheet is null(Java.lang. NullPointerResponse-如果工作表为空)
